DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare allergen ethylenediamine dihydrochloride prepare use methylcellulose versus preparation use polyvinylpyrrolidone .
DOC.detailed_description: We propose open , prospective , single-site study evaluate bioequivalence ethylenediamine dihydrochloride methylcellulose ( MC ) polyvinylpyrrolidone ( PVP ) formulation . Bioequivalence determine 15 adult subject , clinical history contact dermatitis positive patch test ( current previous ) ethylenediamine ( `` sensitive '' ) .
DOC.criteria: Current previous symptom and/or history consistent allergic contact dermatitis , positive patch test ( within past 10 year ) ethylenediamine dihydrochloride 18 year age old , otherwise good health Female subject childbearing potential must consent urine pregnancy test ; result must negative study inclusion . Informed consent sign understood subject . Subjects unable meet inclusion requirement Women breastfeed pregnant Topical treatment last 7 day corticosteroid immunosuppressive agent near test area Systemic treatment last 7 day corticosteroid ( equivalent > 10 mg prednisone ) immunosuppressive agent Treatment ultraviolet ( UV ) light ( include tan ) previous 3 week Acute dermatitis outbreak dermatitis near test area back Subjects unable comply patch test study requirement include multiple return visit activity restriction ( e.g. , protect test panel excess moisture due shower vigorous activity ) Subject participation clinical trial investigational drug , treatment , device , T.R.U.E . TEST , study 3 week prior inclusion study
